card.description: First rocket I worked on, designed and flown during E96R course at UCLA. Designed using SOLIDWORKS and OpenRocket.

page.description: First rocket I worked on, designed and flown during ENGR 96R course at UCLA. Designed using SOLIDWORKS and OpenRocket

card.description: Designed and flown during ENGR 96R course at UCLA. Using an AEROTECH 29MM MOTOR - G80T-13, the rocket flew to ~2000m and recovered successfully.

page.description: Designed and flown during ENGR 96R course at UCLA. Using an AEROTECH 29MM MOTOR - G80T-13, the rocket flew to ~2000m and recovered successfully.

card.description: Served as feed system lead engineer on the hybrid rocket Casanova, leading a team of 5 student engineers in the design, manufacturing, and testing of the rocket's nitrous feed system.
